column1: #text=A while back I realized I needed some instructional material for a project I was working on , and searching for information on the internet was n't yielding the results I desired .
#text=I thought about other sources of information and realized that the library would probably have a book pertaining to what I needed .
#text=So I got in my car and set off for the library .
#text=Once I got there , I signed up for a library card since I knew I 'd need that to be able to borrow a book .
#text=I then went to one of the reference computers and searched for the book I was looking for .
#text=I found the dewey decimal code for the book I wanted , and set off through the aisles .
#text=Finally , I found the aisle I was looking for .
#text=It only took me a moment from there to find the book I wanted .
#text=Book in hand , I went back to the library counter .
#text=I told the librarian I 'd like to borrow the book .
#text=She wrote my information down and on the insert in the book , and gave me a due date .
#text=That 's how I borrowed a book from the library .
